name: OX-NETAL® 2
description: OX-NETAL® 2 is a high-performance energetic alkaline foaming detergent with maximum degreasing power. Easy rinse. High performance foaming product with high detergent and degreasing power. Its exclusive formulation guarantees a high adhesion power that facilitates an adequate period of action of the product, guaranteeing the effectiveness of the cleaning process. Specially formulated for cleaning surfaces, equipment, utensils and installations with a large amount of grease and dirt. Its specific formulation guarantees an optimal result, allowing substantial savings in product, time and labor.
